controls.label: Does your entity have individual customers?
Does your program include appropriate risk-based systems and controls to enable you to be reasonably satisfied that individual customers are who they claim to be?
controls.detail-label: Describe the risk-based systems and controls you use to verify individual customer identity

controls.label: Does your program include a procedure to collect KYC information for individual customers (full name, date of birth, and residential address)?
controls.detail-label: Describe your procedure for collecting KYC information from individual customers

controls.label: Does your program include a procedure to collect additional KYC information for sole trader customers (including business name, principal place of business, and ABN)?
controls.detail-label: Describe your procedure for collecting KYC information from sole trader customers

controls.label: Does your program include risk-based systems and controls to determine whether additional KYC information beyond the minimum requirements should be collected?
controls.detail-label: Describe how you assess whether additional KYC information is required

controls.label: Does your program include a procedure to verify the customer's full name and either date of birth or residential address?
controls.detail-label: Describe your procedure for verifying minimum KYC information

controls.label: Does your program require that verification be based on reliable and independent documentation, electronic data, or a combination of both?
controls.detail-label: Describe the types of reliable and independent sources you use for verification

controls.label: Does your program include risk-based systems and controls to determine whether additional collected KYC information should be verified?
controls.detail-label: Describe how you assess whether additional KYC information should be verified

controls.label: Does your program include risk-based systems and controls to respond to discrepancies identified during KYC verification to determine if you are reasonably satisfied of the customer's identity?
controls.detail-label: Describe your process for handling discrepancies in verification

controls.label: For medium or lower ML/TF risk customers, do you use the documentation-based safe harbour procedure (verifying from original or certified copies of primary photographic ID, or primary non-photographic plus secondary ID)?
controls.detail-label: Describe how you implement the documentation-based safe harbour procedure

controls.label: For medium or lower ML/TF risk customers, do you use the electronic-based safe harbour procedure (verifying name and either residential address, date of birth, or transaction history using at least two independent electronic data sources)?
controls.detail-label: Describe how you implement the electronic-based safe harbour procedure

groups.title: Customer Identification Procedure - Individuals
groups.description: Requirements for identifying and verifying individual customers, including collection of KYC information, verification procedures, and safe harbour methods for medium or lower ML/TF risk relationships.

groups.title: Collection of information
groups.description: Procedures for collecting KYC information about individual customers.

groups.title: Verification of information
groups.description: Procedures for verifying KYC information collected about customers.

groups.title: Documentation-based safe harbour procedure where ML/TF risk is medium or lower
groups.description: Optional documentation-based verification procedure for customers assessed as medium or lower ML/TF risk.

groups.title: Electronic-based safe harbour procedure where ML/TF risk is medium or lower
groups.description: Optional electronic verification procedure for customers assessed as medium or lower ML/TF risk.
